sentence.name: PageViewDataSortDescription

sentence.name: PageViewDataSortCopyInstructions
sentence.value: Kopier tabellen: Se rediger menu og brug Vælg alle og så Kopier. Eller tryk Crtl+A og så Ctrl+C

sentence.name: PxWebMarkingTipsHeader
sentence.value: Tips om hvordan du markerer i en liste

sentence.name: PxWebMarkingTipsText
sentence.value:
Der skal vælges mindst en værdi i for hver variabel. Variabler ses i hver sin listeboks. For de fleste variabler har vi valgt en standard værdi. Nogle variabler kan vi ikke angive standardværdi for - de skal vælges, og er markeret med en rød stjerne.
For at markere hvilken værdi du ønsker med i din tabel klikker du på den.
For at vælge flere holder du CTRL knap nede og klikker med mus på de værdier du vil have med.
For at vælge Vis alle i en liste boks: - Markér første linie i listen. Tryk derefter på knapperne SHIFT og END samtidigt. Eller klik på knappen 'V'
For at vælge / fortryde : - Tryk på knappen CTRL og klik på venstre museknap på den valgte linje samtidigt. Eller klik på knappen '-'
Hvis du vil vælge mere end én værdi i en liste boks: - Marker værdier i træk ved at trykke på venstre museknap og slip den over de ønskede linjer. Eller markér den første værdi på din liste, og tryk derefter på knappen SHIFT på samme tid som du trykker på op or ned-pilene på tastaturet. - Marker værdi, ikke i træk, ved at trykke på knappen CTRL på samme tid som du klikker på venstre museknap på de ønskede værdier.
For at søge efter en bestemt værdi i listen: - Markér første linie i listen. Skriv derefter det første bogstav i rækken du ønsker. Hvis du ikke får den rigtige værdi, prøv at skrive igen, indtil du finder den rigtige værdi. Eller brug up or down pile or museknappen for at se yderligere.

sentence.name: PxWebTableUserSettingsZeroOptionNoZeroAndNil
sentence.value: Skjul rækker kun med nuller eller '-'

sentence.name: PxWebTableUserSettingsZeroOptionNoZeroNilAndSymbol
sentence.value: Skjul rækker kun med nuller, '-' eller '.'

sentence.name: PxWebChartPieChartInformation
sentence.value: Et lagkage diagram kan kun indeholde en variabel med mere end en værdi. Brug 'Slet variabel' eller 'Slet værdi' på 'Rediger og beregn'-menuen ovenfor for at fjerne varibler og værdier.

sentence.name: PxWebChartPyramidChartInformation
sentence.value: For at vise danne en befolkningspyramide, kan kun en af variablerne have et ubegrænset antal værdier. Desuden skal en af de andre variable have to værdier, mens resten af de øvrige variable kun kan have én værdi. F.eks hvis alder har mange værdier, køn har to værdier kan andre variabler som fx fødested og tid højst have en værdi. Brug 'Slet værdi'-operationen i 'Rediger og beregne'-menuen ovenfor for at fjerne værdier.

sentence.name: PxWebChartTooManyValuesInformation
sentence.value: Du har valgt for mange værdier.

sentence.name: PxWebTableCropped
sentence.value: Note: Tabellen er afskåret. Højst {0} rækker og {1} kolonner kan vises på skærm

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsGlobalStrictAggregationCheckInfo
sentence.value: If strict check of aggregation files will be performed eller not. If set to yes the aggregation files (.agg) must have the keyword 'valueset' set to the name of the current valueset, if it is not a match the aggregation will not be added.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsGlobalShowInformationTypesInfo
sentence.value: Which Information types that shall be displayed in the information of the table

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsGlobalDetailedInformationInfo
sentence.value: Should a link to the infofile be displayed. If the metadata are displayed as links a link to the infofile will appear next to the footnotes link. If metadata shall appear in tabs the link to the infofile will appear under the information section in the About table tab. The link to the infofile is only shown on the selection page.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsAdministrationUseIPFilterInfo
sentence.value: If IP filter shall be used when logging in to the administration pages eller not

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsAdministrationIPAddressesInfo
sentence.value: List of IP addresses med permission to access the administration pages. This setting is only valid if the setting 'Use IP filter' is set to true.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsMenuMenuModeInfo
sentence.value: Controls how the menu is displayed

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsMenuShowRootInfo
sentence.value: Shall the root node be displayed eller not?

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsMenuExpandAllInfo
sentence.value: Shall the tree be expanded eller collapsed?

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsMenuSortByAliasInfo
sentence.value: Shall the nodes be sorted by their alias names eller not?

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsMenuShowSelectionLinkInfo

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsMenuShowDownloadLinkInfo
sentence.value: Shall the link where the user can download the table as a file be displayed eller not?

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsMenuViewLinkModeInfo
sentence.value: Mode for the view-link. Can have one of three different values: 'Default values' = Default values are displayed in a table when the user clicks the link. 'All values' = All values are shown within a table when the user clicks the link. 'Hidden' = The link is not displayed.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsMenuNumberOfValuesInDefaultViewInfo
sentence.value: Maximum number of values that are selected when Viewlink mode = 'Default values'. Values are preselected rather than allowing the users to select variables and values by themselves.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsMenuShowModifiedDateInfo
sentence.value: Defines if information about when the PX-file was last updated in the file system shall be displayed in PxWeb eller not.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsMenuShowLastUpdatedInfo
sentence.value: Defines if LAST-UPDATED in the PX-files shall be displayed in PxWeb eller not

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsMenuShowFileSizeInfo
sentence.value: If information about the filesize shall be displayed eller not

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsMenuShowTableCategoryInfo
sentence.value: If information about the table category shall be displayed eller not

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsMenuShowTableUpdatedAfterPublishInfo
sentence.value: If tables that has been updated after they was published shall be marked in the menu eller not

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsMenuShowVariablesAndValuesInfo
sentence.value: If information about variables and values within the table shall be displayed eller not

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsMenuMetadataAsIconsInfo
sentence.value: If table metadata shall be displayed as icons after the table name. If set to 'Yes' icons will be displayed. If set to 'No' metadata will be dsipalyed as text.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsMenuShowTextToMetadata
sentence.value: If a explanation shall be displayd next to the metadata

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsMenuShowTextToMetadataInfo
sentence.value: Vis a explanatory text relevant to table metadata. For example, if set to 'Yes' the text 'Modified' is inserted before the table metadata modified date, if set to 'No' the table metadata is shown but no describing text.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSelectionCellLimitScreenInfo

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSelectionAllowAggregationsInfo

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSelectionShowHierarchiesInfo

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSelectionHierarchicalLevelsOpenInfo
sentence.value: Specifies how expanded (number of tree-levels) the hierarchy tree should be as default

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSelectionShowMarkingTipsInfo

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSelectionMarkingTipsURLInfo

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSelectionMaxRowsWithoutSearchInfo

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSelectionAlwaysShowTimeVariableWithoutSearchInfo

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSelectionListSizeInfo

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSelectionShowSelectionLimitsInfo

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSelectionValuesetMustBeSelectedFirstInfo

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSelectionShowAllAvailableValuesSearchButtonInfo
sentence.value: Is the 'Show alle available values' button in the search-view. Warning! settings this setting to true can result in big web pages that may be heavy to load.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSelectionTitleFromMenuInfo
sentence.value: If set to true, the table title will be displayed as it was displayed in the menu

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSelectionMetadataAsLinksInfo

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsNavigationNavigationFlowVisibleInfo

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsValidationBiggerThanMaxSetting

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsPresentationDefaultLayoutInfo

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsPresentationTableMaxRowsInfo
sentence.value: The maximum number of rækker that will be displayed within the table on screen. If the underlying data table contains more rækker than what is specified in this setting, the table on screen will be cropped.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsPresentationTableMaxColumnsInfo

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsPresentationTableTitleVisibleInfo
sentence.value: If the table title shall be displayed within the table eller not

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsPresentationTableDisplayAttributesInfo
sentence.value: If cell information shall be displayed in the table eller not. Information displayed is attributes and notes at cell level.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsPresentationTableDisplayDefaultAttributesInfo

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesChartsGeneralGuidelinesVerticalInfo

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesChartsGeneralMaxValuesInfo
sentence.value: The maximum number of cells (product of alle values) that can be selected when creating a chart. If the selected number of cells are larger than this value no chart will be displayed. The purpose of this setting is to spare the web server from creating very large chart which takes a lot of calculating power from the web server.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesChartsGeneralShowSourseInfo
sentence.value: Vis the source to the chart

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesChartsGeneralLogoImgInfo
sentence.value: Vælg the image for the logotype in the chart.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesChartsGeneralLineColorPhrameInfo
sentence.value: Choose the color of the border around the chart. If no line thickness is specified, then no frame.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesChartsGeneralLineThicknessPhrameInfo
sentence.value: Vælg line thickness of the frame around the chart. If not specified, so there will be no frame.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesChartsGeneralBackgroundColorGraphsInfo
sentence.value: Choose a background color to the chart.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesApiGeneralApiPxDatabasesInfo
sentence.value: Defines which PX databases are accessible via the API in which languages

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesApiGeneralApiCnmmDatabasesInfo
sentence.value: Defines which CNMM databases are accessible via the API in which languages

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesApiGeneralMaxValuesReturnedInfo
sentence.value: Maximum number of values returned from request

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesApiGeneralLimiterRequestsInfo
sentence.value: Maximum number of requests (works togheter med Limiter timespan)

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesApiGeneralLimiterTimespanInfo
sentence.value: Timespan for how many request can be made (see LimiterRequests)

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesApiGeneralEnableCacheInfo
sentence.value: If cacheing of requests shall be made eller not

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesApiGeneralClearCacheInfo
sentence.value: If specified the cache will be cleared at the specified time(s). Separate times med semi colon. Example: 09:30;12:00;13:49

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesApiGeneralShowQueryInformationInfo
sentence.value: If enabled a information link is displayed in PxWeb in the presentation views. When the link is clicked information about how to access the current table via the API is displayed.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesSaveQueryGeneralSaveQueryPxDatabasesInfo
sentence.value: Defines which PX databases that will have the save query function available

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesSaveQueryGeneralSaveQueryCnmmDatabasesInfo
sentence.value: Defines which CNMM databases that will have the save query function available

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesSearchGeneralCacheTimeInfo
sentence.value: Time in minutes that the search index will be cached

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesSearchGeneralResultListLengthInfo
sentence.value: Maximum number of tables that will be displayed in the search result list

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesSearchGeneralDefaultOperatorInfo
sentence.value: The operator AND/OR that will be used by default when more than one word is included in a search query

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesBackgroundWorkerGeneralSleepTimeInfo
sentence.value: The time in seconds the worker process shall sleep between iterations

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesBackgroundWorkerGeneralStatusInfo
sentence.value: Describes the current status of the background worker process

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesBackgroundWorkerGeneralCurrentActivityInfo
sentence.value: What the background worker process is doing right now

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesBackgroundWorkerConfirmStop
sentence.value: Do you want to stop the background worker process?

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesBackgroundWorkerConfirmStart
sentence.value: Do you want to start the background worker process?

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesBackgroundWorkerConfirmWakeUp
sentence.value: Do you want to wake up the background worker process?

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsLanguageDefaultLanguageInfo
sentence.value: The default language for the PxWeb site

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsLanguageSiteLanguagesInfo
sentence.value: Selected languages will be available on the PxWeb site.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsLanguageDecimalSeparatorInfo
sentence.value: Character to use as decimal separator

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsLanguageThousandSeparatorInfo
sentence.value: Character to use as thousand separator

sentence.name: PxWebAdminConfirmSaveSettings
sentence.value: Do you want to save the settings?

sentence.name: PxWebAdminConfirmGenerateDb
sentence.value: Do you want to generate a ny database?

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsImplementedInComingVersions
sentence.value: This feature will be implemented in a coming version of PxWeb

sentence.name: UnauthorizedTableMessage
sentence.value: You are not authorized to view this table!

sentence.name: UnauthorizedDatabaseMessage
sentence.value: You are not authorized to view this database!

sentence.name: PxWebAdminUsersAddedUser
sentence.value: has been added as a user
